about_the_game:
Beeswing is a game set in a small village in rural Scotland, the village I grew up in, home. Visit the places and people who shaped a life and discover their stories. Represented in hand painted, water colour graphics with a unique, acoustic soundtrack.

New game!

Features


  • No puzzles or fighting or anything like that.
  • Under 3 hours of content!
  • Stuff you find in your regular day like people who leave their TV on when they have visitors and friends feeling a bit glum!
  • My mum, she's there.
  • Quite a slow movement speed.
  • Old People!
  • Sad bits.
  • and not much more!

  • My mum, she's there.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64 bits / Fedora 64 bits
  • Processor: 1.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Debian distribs (like Steam OS) for now. Working hard on this Debian support!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: Beeswing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8
  • Processor: 1.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews:
“But this game is actually very beautiful. The music is exquisite, of course (the man’s a genius) and the premise of the whole game is sincerely heartfelt.”
5/5 – The Arts Desk

“self-important posturing”
3/5 – Kill Screen
short_description: Beeswing is a game set in a small village in rural Scotland, the village I grew up in. Visit the places and people who shaped a life and discover their stories. Represented in hand painted, water colour graphics with a unique, acoustic soundtrack.
